    vista ğŸš¶â€â™€ï¸ğŸš²ğŸš—ğŸšŒ

    âœ¨ Features âœ¨

    • Offers vista_dm, a public version of VISTA as a relational data model in R, by leveraging on the {dm} package.
    • ğŸš§ (coming soon) Converts VISTA and 1% ABS Census Sample File to CVISTA (C here stands for close-enough-to), an intermediate format.

    â˜ï¸ If you have other versions of VISTA, you can use the vista_to_dm() function to convert your VISTA tables into a {dm} object.

    Installation

    You can install the released version of vista from GitHub with:

    install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("asiripanich/vista")

    Example 

    library(vista)
vista18 <- get_vista18()
vista18_dm <- vista_to_dm(
  persons = vista18$persons,
  households = vista18$households,
  trips = vista18$trips,
  stops = vista18$stops,
  jte = vista18$jte,
  jtw = vista18$jtw
)
    library(dm)
vista18_dm %>%
  dm_draw()
